0.title: FUNCTION-0
content: 1-)Palindrom words are same backwards and forwards.
2-)Create function take word as parameter and return is palindrom or not.
3-)Compare chars from begin and end respectively.
4-)If these aren't equals return word is not palindrom.
5-)If no inequality return word is palindrom.
6-)Print rotavator and machine is palindrom or not.

content: 1-)Palindrom baştan ve sondan aynı okunan kelimelerdir.
